speaker: User
Help Desk
message_content: Hi, if the page number in the book is "xx" (because it's located in the preface), how should I should i do my in-text citation?
Hello, how may I help you?
You can cite the page number as is :) so for example PERSON_LASTNAME_3, 1927, p. xx)
Those are roman numeral, so still a valid numbering, in a sense
